pages.text: $(o)Unsurprisingly, the my'ri found a metal as capable as conducting their powers as they are. The issue is that it's extremely durable, requiring something more powerful than diamond to extract. While netherite is a chore to find, at least myrial steel is plentiful.$()$(br2)Found as blocks in $(l:minebound:structures/crashed_ship)crashed ships$() and $(l:minebound:structures/ruined_base)ruined bases.$() Requires netherite to mine.
